00017 #ifndef _VIENNACL_PROD_HPP_
00018 #define _VIENNACL_PROD_HPP_
00019 
00020 #include "viennacl/forwards.h"
00021 #include "tag_of.hpp"
00022 
00023 
00024 namespace viennacl
00025 {
00026   //
00027   // generic prod function
00028   //   uses tag dispatch to identify which algorithm
00029   //   should be called 
00030   //
00031   namespace linalg 
00032   {
00033     
00034     #ifdef VIENNACL_HAVE_UBLAS
00035     // ----------------------------------------------------
00036     // UBLAS
00037     //
00038     template< typename MatrixT, typename VectorT >
00039     VectorT 
00040     prod(MatrixT const& matrix, VectorT const& vector, 
00041          typename viennacl::tools::enable_if< viennacl::is_ublas< typename viennacl::traits::tag_of< MatrixT >::type >::value
00042                                             >::type* dummy = 0)
00043     {
00044       // std::cout << "ublas .. " << std::endl;
00045       return boost::numeric::ublas::prod(matrix, vector);
00046     }
00047     #endif
00048     
00049     // ----------------------------------------------------
00050     // VIENNACL
00051     //
00052     template< typename MatrixT, typename VectorT >
00053     viennacl::vector_expression< const MatrixT, 
00054       const VectorT, viennacl::op_prod >
00055     prod(MatrixT const& matrix, VectorT const& vector, 
00056          typename viennacl::tools::enable_if< viennacl::is_viennacl< typename viennacl::traits::tag_of< MatrixT >::type >::value
00057                                             >::type* dummy = 0)
00058     {
00059       // std::cout << "viennacl .. " << std::endl;
00060       return viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(matrix, vector);
00061     }
00062 
00063   } // end namespace linalg
00064 } // end namespace viennacl
00065 #endif
